title: Anastasia_D40
author: Anastasia_D40
content: Hello everyoneÂ  I must say right away, I have already written a similar question to here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5456729.msg62421905#msg62421905I just wanted to post it here right away, but I missed.So don't consider it spam, I just need more people to research))Actually, the question is:Hello everybody! I have recently started to get interested in blockchain technologies. To delve into this topic, I started looking for information about upcoming blockchain events. And what I found - about 400+ events related to the blockchain : five of them, will be very soon.And you know, I have analyzed these events, but there is one question left.Who visits them? GrinIt may not be difficult for you to answer the 5 questions in my questionnaire and tell me if you have had any experience in attending such events)Thanks! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdPMs8jbE-k920nat5pyP67Yainr65xg--GtH9o-I9x4BH0sg/viewform1.Blockchain Oracle Summithttps://blockchainconferences.eu/Dates: June 20-22, 20232.Ieee International Conference On Web Services Hybrid Eventhttp://conferences.computer.org/icws/2023/Dates: July 2-8, 20233. 14th International Conference on Cryptologyhttps://easychair.org/cfp/AFRICACRYPT2023Dates: July 19-21, 20234. Sustainable Energy Blockchain and Cryptocurrencyhttps://gsusi.com/Dates: August 1-2, 20235. ETH Warsaw Conference & Hackathonhttps://www.ethwarsaw.dev/Dates: August-September 30-3, 2023I found these events here https://data40.com/downloads/blockchain-events-and-expos-calendar-2023/
